participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily enjoys celebrating life’s milestones with friends and family. She's introspective and values personal growth through activities like yoga.
participant_1.background: I made a delicious cake for my friends and family to celebrate my birthday. I'm not too interested in social media, I'd rather be focusing on my yoga and finding a partner to spend my life with. I have two siblings. My favorite singer is Justin Timberlake. I have to live by a schedule in order to keep my mind right.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Jake thrives on physical challenges and enjoys exploring new experiences. He has a playful spirit and values companionship in his activities.
participant_2.background: I love to challenge myself physically and mentally, and I find that yoga provides the perfect opportunity for both. I'm not as active as I should be, and I need to lose weight. I enjoyed playing games with my friends and going on adventures together. I'd rather talk about my favorite places to drive. I do not like the song Sweet Home Alabama.

content.text: I'm a huge fan of Justin Timberlake! Did you see his new album?
I haven't had a chance to listen to it yet, but I'm sure it's great!
I love his music. It always gets me in a good mood.
Me too! What's your favorite song?
I can't decide between Mirrors and Can't Stop the Feeling. What's yours?
I like Mirrors too! It's a beautiful song.
I know, right? It's so emotional.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to pop and R&B.
Me too! I love discovering new music.
Me too! I love finding new artists that I like.
Have you heard of Harry Styles?
I have! I like his music too.
I'm glad! He's one of my favorite artists.
